properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_GRADE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ? AND MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT STORE_NO, STORE_NM, STORE_PHONE, STORE_ADDR, STORE_IMG, COR_NO FROM STORE WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND STORE_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PHONE= ? , MEMBER_EMAIL = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO= ?
UPDATE STORE SET STORE_PHONE= ? , STORE_ADDR = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO= ?
